description: [Mobile:Foundation] Create React Native app (iOS + Android) in repo with reproducible dev/build workflow
[Mobile:Foundation] Define environment config for hosted dev/stage/prod (no self-hosted in V1)
[Mobile:Foundation] Add typed REST API client wrapper with consistent error mapping
[Mobile:Foundation] Add request middleware for auth headers, tenant headers (if required), and user-agent tagging
[Mobile:Foundation] Add network timeouts and retry/backoff for safe idempotent requests
[Mobile:Foundation] Add global app state bootstrapping (auth gate) and splash/loading sequence
[Mobile:Foundation] Add navigation skeleton (tabs + stack) and deep link routing for ticket detail
[Mobile:Foundation] Add basic design system primitives (colors/typography/spacing) aligned with Alga web
[Mobile:Foundation] Add skeleton/loading/empty/error states standard library
[Mobile:Foundation] Add secure storage abstraction (Keychain/Keystore) for session secrets
[Mobile:Foundation] Add PII-safe logging abstraction with redaction and log level controls
[Mobile:Foundation] Add analytics scaffolding (screen views + key actions) with opt-out hook (optional)
[Mobile:Foundation] Add crash/error reporting hook (provider TBD) with PII redaction
[Mobile:Foundation] Add caching layer for ticket list/detail with TTL + invalidation on updates
[Mobile:Foundation] Add pull-to-refresh and background refresh on app resume
[Mobile:Foundation] Add offline detection UX (always-connected warning + retry actions)
[Mobile:Foundation] Add accessibility baseline (labels, focus order, touch target sizes)
[Mobile:Foundation] Add localization scaffolding (en-US first)
[Mobile:Foundation] Add Settings screen shell + diagnostics (version/build/environment)
[Mobile:Foundation] Add CI job to lint/typecheck mobile app package
[Mobile:Foundation] Add CI job to run mobile unit tests
[Mobile:Foundation] Add documentation for mobile local dev and build/release process
[Mobile:Auth] Implement sign-in screen that launches system browser to Alga hosted login
[Mobile:Auth] Implement deep link callback handler with state validation and OTT capture
[Mobile:Auth] Exchange OTT for mobile API credential via server endpoint
[Mobile:Auth] Persist session securely and restore on cold start
[Mobile:Auth] Implement session refresh/rotation before expiry
[Mobile:Auth] Handle refresh failure (revoked/expired) by routing to sign-in
[Mobile:Auth] Implement logout that revokes server-side session and clears local storage
[Mobile:Auth] Support Microsoft SSO via web login (no provider-specific native SDK)
[Mobile:Auth] Support Google SSO via web login (no provider-specific native SDK)
[Mobile:Auth] Record device/app metadata with session issue (for audit/analytics)
[Mobile:Auth] Implement optional biometric gate to re-open app (local-only)
[Mobile:Auth] Ensure tokens are never logged or sent to crash reports
[Mobile:Auth] Implement auth capability discovery endpoint (mobile enabled, providers available)
[Mobile:Auth] Implement resilient UX for auth outages (retry, clear messaging)
[Mobile:Auth] Support vanity/hosted domains for login handoff (configurable allowlist)
[Mobile:Tickets:List] Implement Tickets list screen with infinite scroll pagination
[Mobile:Tickets:List] Implement pull-to-refresh to reload first page
[Mobile:Tickets:List] Show ticket number/id, subject/title, status, priority, assignee, client/company, updated-at
[Mobile:Tickets:List] Render status and priority badges with accessible contrast
[Mobile:Tickets:List] Implement server-side sorting (default updated-at desc)
[Mobile:Tickets:List] Implement server-side search with debounced input
[Mobile:Tickets:List] Implement filter UI for status, assignee, priority, updated-since
[Mobile:Tickets:List] Add quick filters: My tickets, Unassigned, High priority, Recently updated
[Mobile:Tickets:List] Support combining filters and show active filter summary
[Mobile:Tickets:List] Support clear-all filters
[Mobile:Tickets:List] Persist last-used filters per user
[Mobile:Tickets:List] Handle empty results and error retries gracefully
[Mobile:Tickets:List] Prefetch ticket detail for first visible rows (optional)
[Mobile:Tickets:List] Implement ticket stats summary header using tickets stats endpoint (optional)
[Mobile:Tickets:List] Ensure list results respect RBAC and data visibility
[Mobile:Tickets:Detail] Implement Ticket detail screen with loading skeleton and refresh
[Mobile:Tickets:Detail] Render ticket header (number/title/status/priority/assignee)
[Mobile:Tickets:Detail] Render requester/contact and client/company summary
[Mobile:Tickets:Detail] Render key timestamps (created/updated/closed) with relative time
[Mobile:Tickets:Detail] Render description with safe link handling (optional markdown)
[Mobile:Tickets:Detail] Render comments/timeline with pagination
[Mobile:Tickets:Detail] Differentiate internal vs public comments visually
[Mobile:Tickets:Detail] Show commenter identity and timestamp for entries
[Mobile:Tickets:Detail] Support copy ticket id/number and “open in web” link-out
[Mobile:Tickets:Detail] Handle 404/403 states with friendly UX
[Mobile:Tickets:Detail] Cache last-viewed ticket detail (TTL)
[Mobile:Tickets:Detail] Ensure detail respects RBAC and field-level visibility
[Mobile:Tickets:Updates] Implement add-comment composer (multiline) with send action
[Mobile:Tickets:Updates] Support comment visibility selection (internal vs public)
[Mobile:Tickets:Updates] Validate comment length and show inline errors
[Mobile:Tickets:Updates] Post comment and update timeline on success
[Mobile:Tickets:Updates] Preserve draft on failure/navigation and allow retry
[Mobile:Tickets:Updates] Prevent duplicate submissions while in-flight
[Mobile:Tickets:Updates] Implement status picker using server-provided allowed statuses
[Mobile:Tickets:Updates] Submit status change and update ticket header/list badges
[Mobile:Tickets:Updates] Handle 409 conflicts (ticket changed elsewhere) with refresh + retry UX
[Mobile:Tickets:Updates] Include mobile client metadata on update calls (audit)
[Mobile:Tickets:Updates] Ensure updates respect RBAC and server-side validation
[Mobile:Tickets:Critical Updates] Implement assign-to-me action and reflect in UI
[Mobile:Tickets:Critical Updates] Implement unassign action when permitted
[Mobile:Tickets:Critical Updates] Implement priority update via picker
[Mobile:Tickets:Critical Updates] Implement due date update (if supported by API)
[Mobile:Tickets:Critical Updates] Implement watchers/subscribers add/remove (if supported by API)
[Mobile:Tickets:Critical Updates] Implement time entry creation from ticket (if supported by API)
[Mobile:Tickets:Critical Updates] Surface validation errors clearly for partial updates
[Mobile:Tickets:Critical Updates] Support field-level loading indicators for partial updates
[Mobile:Settings] Implement Settings screen showing current user identity and tenant
[Mobile:Settings] Add “clear cache” action
[Mobile:Settings] Add “logout” action
[Mobile:Settings] Add “about/legal” screens (privacy policy/terms)
[Mobile:Settings] Add toggles: biometric gate, hide sensitive info in notifications (future)
[Mobile:Quality] Optimize list rendering (virtualized list, avoid re-renders)
[Mobile:Quality] Optimize payload sizes via slim DTOs / field selection (server support)
[Mobile:Quality] Handle timezone/locale formatting consistently
[Mobile:Quality] Add privacy review checklist and PII inventory for mobile data flows
[Mobile:Quality] Add observability events for auth success/failure and API error rates
[Mobile:Release] Set up iOS TestFlight and Android internal testing pipelines
[Mobile:Release] Define signing, versioning, and release notes process
[Mobile:Release] Add app icon/splash assets
[Mobile:Release] Add rollout checklist and rollback plan
[Server:Mobile Auth] Add mobile handoff endpoint/page that issues a short-lived, single-use OTT for authenticated web sessions
[Server:Mobile Auth] Add storage for mobile OTTs with expiry, single-use semantics, and tenant/user binding
[Server:Mobile Auth] Add API endpoint to exchange OTT for mobile API credential (short-lived) and refresh token/rotation mechanism
[Server:Mobile Auth] Integrate with existing Microsoft/Google SSO configurations used by web login
[Server:Mobile Auth] Add API endpoint to refresh/rotate mobile credentials and invalidate old tokens
[Server:Mobile Auth] Add API endpoint to revoke mobile sessions (logout)
[Server:Mobile Auth] Add endpoint for mobile capability discovery (mobile enabled, providers available, TTLs)
[Server:Mobile Auth] Add rate limiting for OTT issue/exchange/refresh endpoints
[Server:Mobile Auth] Add audit logging for mobile session issue/refresh/revoke events
[Server:Mobile Auth] Ensure ticket APIs used by mobile are available and documented (list/search/detail/comments/status/assignment/stats)
[Server:Mobile Auth] Ensure ticket comment create API supports internal/public visibility flag
[Server:Mobile Auth] Ensure consistent error shape for validation/auth errors for mobile clients
[Server:Mobile Auth] Add migrations for new tables/columns used by mobile auth
[Server:Mobile Auth] Add tests for OTT single-use + expiry and credential rotation
[Server:Mobile Auth] Add documentation for mobile auth configuration and hosted domain allowlist
[Phase2:Notifications] Implement push notification registration (APNs/FCM) and device token management
[Phase2:Notifications] Add server endpoints to register/unregister device tokens
[Phase2:Notifications] Send push notifications for assignment/status/mention events
[Phase2:Notifications] Deep link from push notification into ticket detail
[Phase2:Notifications] Add notification preferences screen
[Phase2:Self-hosted] Add base URL selection and self-hosted domain onboarding UX
[Phase2:Self-hosted] Document self-hosted requirements for mobile handoff URLs and SSO callback domains
[Phase2:Self-hosted] Add self-hosted connectivity diagnostics and TLS certificate troubleshooting UX
[Mobile:Foundation] Implement standardized API error mapping: network vs validation vs auth vs permission vs server error
[Mobile:Foundation] Implement global HTTP 401 handler (attempt refresh once then force sign-in)
[Mobile:Foundation] Implement global HTTP 403 handler (show no-access UX)
[Mobile:Foundation] Implement request cancellation for superseded ticket search queries
[Mobile:Foundation] Implement request deduplication for concurrent identical GETs
[Mobile:Foundation] Implement app-level telemetry correlation id on every request
[Mobile:Foundation] Implement secure handling of deep link URLs (reject unexpected hosts/paths)
[Mobile:Foundation] Implement “open in web” URL builder for hosted environments
[Mobile:Foundation] Implement clipboard helper that redacts sensitive fields by default (configurable)
[Mobile:Foundation] Implement app state restoration for last-viewed tab and last-opened ticket (optional)
[Mobile:Foundation] Implement memory leak guardrails for large lists (profiling checklist)
[Mobile:Foundation] Implement startup performance budget and measurement
[Mobile:Auth] Implement OTT exchange retry with exponential backoff and single-flight guard
[Mobile:Auth] Implement refresh token rotation handling with safe rollback on failures
[Mobile:Auth] Implement session revocation check on app resume (throttled)
[Mobile:Auth] Implement sign-in error UX for invalid tenant/provider configuration
[Mobile:Auth] Implement sign-in error UX for user without required ticket permissions
[Mobile:Auth] Implement sign-in UX copy that clearly indicates “internal users only”

[Mobile:Tickets:Detail] Implement ticket detail - cache invalidation after posting comment/status change
[Mobile:Tickets:Detail] Implement ticket detail - optimistic UI for comment post with rollback on failure
[Mobile:Tickets:Detail] Implement ticket detail - optimistic UI for status change with rollback on failure

[Mobile:Tickets:Detail] Implement ticket detail - jump-to-top button on long timelines (optional)

[Mobile:Tickets:Updates] Implement updates - comment visibility default (internal) and remembered per user
